results.content: Tutor have worst pronunciation, he is unable to pronounce 90% of English words  he said press Alt+jet and it took me 10 minutes in understanding that he want  to say Alt+Z

response.content:
Hi dear, I can see the stats that you haven't even gone through 10% of the course so i request you to please at least complete 20% of the course before making any final conclusion, also ALT+Z is the basic, these things are not very difficult to understand, the main thing is the concept building(understanding what and how's) which i am sure you will get a strong hold on if you continue further, also i would like to mention that no course can make you a complete web developer(no spoon feeding this is reality) if you do not research on your own(i have taught about this in the coming section on how to research) and learn to find little solutions by yourself(sharing my personal experience over the years). again i can see you are still eligible for a refund no questions asked so if you do not find comfortable continuing i will be more than happy to process the refund. as always thanks for your valuable feedback i wish you all the best for future??
Stay safe and Happy coding...❤️
